name: David Ramirez
text: I got turned off by Arrow very early on in season 1. They made him Batman minus.

source_obj.text: I got turned off by Arrow very early on in season 1. They made him Batman minus.

replies.text: Let's be honest Dave, even in the comics, Green Arrow is often Batman minus  :p  Arrow is so bad now though, he hardly even uses the arrows!

Oh yeah. That's kinda true.     You know what, it's the look. I instinctively think of GA as kinda Errol Flynn and a little more dashing and lighthearted than Batman, even if the actual comics had him so serious.
